title: AIGA poster typeface
content:
Hey all, could really use your help on this one. Comes from an AIGA poster. It's not Avenir, Nexa, Soleil... any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013174348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/manifesto(2)_4057.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013174348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/myaiga_banner_72_6237.png)
author: dwsn

comments.content:
Should've known it was Lineto... I always like their stuff.  
Thanks a lot for the help.
